title: British Airways Announces Special Fares For Indian FliersTravelandtourworld.com
text:
British Airways Announces Special Fares For Indian Fliers
British Airways ( BA) announced Tuesday that it was lowering its ticket prices for a limited period for economy class passengers travelling from India to the airline’s global destinations including the US and British Airways is delighted to announce a fantastic September bonanza for its customers from India to select international destinations with all-inclusive fares starting from just Rs 49,486, the release said, adding that with this special offer, the airline was putting its entire UK and North America network on sale.
Under the special offer, the bookings for which can be made up to September 20, customers can choose from a range of the airline’s network of nine destinations in the UK, 25 in North America and additional 200 to North America in partnership with American Airlines, the airline said.
The outbound travel period under the offer will be up to December 31, 2015, it said.
British Airways currently operates 49 flights a week from five cities in India – New Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Bangalore and Hyderabad.
British Airways’ regional commercial manager for South Asia Moran Birger said, “This September, we invite our customers from India to take advantage of our great fares and explore the wonderful sites these destinations have to offer.”
Source:- British Airways
